Create a Shuffled Deck of Cards

create_board.Rd

Create a Shuffled Deck of Cards

Usage

create_board(num_decks = 4)

Arguments

num_decks

The number of decks shuffled in the game

Value

A shuffled deck of cards.

Examples


create_board()
#>   [1] "5♠"  "Q♦"  "Q♣"  "3♦"  "K♥"  "2♦"  "Q♦"  "A♦"  "10♣" "J♠"  "2♠"  "6♣" 
#>  [13] "7♦"  "7♠"  "7♥"  "9♥"  "A♦"  "4♦"  "3♥"  "J♦"  "J♥"  "J♣"  "9♥"  "5♥" 
#>  [25] "A♣"  "2♥"  "2♦"  "9♠"  "8♦"  "8♣"  "8♠"  "3♠"  "Q♥"  "3♥"  "A♣"  "4♠" 
#>  [37] "7♦"  "5♠"  "6♥"  "J♦"  "7♠"  "6♥"  "4♣"  "4♠"  "7♠"  "2♣"  "2♠"  "A♣" 
#>  [49] "8♦"  "10♣" "7♣"  "Q♣"  "6♦"  "9♦"  "10♥" "9♦"  "A♥"  "7♦"  "10♥" "3♠" 
#>  [61] "8♥"  "J♦"  "A♥"  "3♣"  "10♣" "3♣"  "J♠"  "J♥"  "4♥"  "K♥"  "K♦"  "7♥" 
#>  [73] "2♣"  "4♥"  "8♣"  "3♦"  "K♠"  "9♦"  "4♠"  "Q♠"  "9♠"  "10♦" "8♥"  "6♦"

#>  [97] "A♠"  "2♦"  "5♣"  "2♠"  "2♣"  "A♠"  "K♦"  "Q♠"  "6♥"  "4♥"  "7♠"  "7♣"
